features: ULTRAFINE MICRO BRISTLES - Features 12,000+ soft micro bristles that a provide a gentle and deep clean. The unique spacing design of the bristle head also helps the brush to effectively dry.

GENTLE AND SOFT - Feel the difference between our gentle micro-bristles versus traditional nylon bristles. Our toothbrush doesn’t irritate gums, while still providing a deep clean and polish. Ideal for those with sensitive teeth and gums.

PREMIUM MATERIALS - Many traditional toothbrushes use a harmful metal plate to embed the bristles into the head of the handle. However, our toothbrush features metal-free bristle planting tech. This prevents any possibility of rusting in our product.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - As a family-owned business in the beautiful Pacific Northwest, we strive to maintain excellent products and customer service. See why thousands of satisfied beauty salons and spas around the United States use our beauty and health products. Our Polishing Toothbrush is perfect for YOUR daily routine or a gift for your family and friends.
body.description: The Lindo Polishing Toothbrushes are an innovative take on traditional oral hygiene tools. The brush head has over 12,000 premium bristles that are incredibly soft and gentle for sensitive gums. Features a unique spacing design to promote effective airflow and drying. The toothbrush construction is free of any metal parts to eliminate the possibility of rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow!! I purchased my first set from a small local beauty shop. I had a recent dentist appointment and my dentist told me that I needed a deep clean because of my gum line. It’s a simple process but the dentist has to numb the mouth with gel and they section off the mouth, not done all at once, so kind of a big deal. Anyway, after using this toothbrush for a couple of months, my dentist was surprised when I returned and my gums and teeth weren’t as bad as before! She even asked if I had switched to an electric brush! This toothbrush is amazing and made a huge difference in my cleaning experience! I have purchased 2 more times since the beauty store and I have gotten a few friends hooked as well! The bristles are very soft and I can get the brush into the smaller spaces in my mouth. It has literally been a game changer! One of my friends described it as “a hug” for her teeth! Its the best toothbrush!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this toothbrush!!! Just feels good while you are brushing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush for sensitive teeth and gums
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive teeth and gum problems. This is the best toothbrush I've tried. Others feel like they don't get your teeth clean. It's gentle and the pad in the middlereally cleans your teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: O goodness...this toothbrush just became my #1 fav brush of all time!!! Talk about cleaning teeth, gumline, gums, tongue buildup....all brushed & cleaned with super gentle effectiveness. Amazing.!!! I'm so happy with this. I bought another brand a few years ago and I loved it until now. This becomes #1. I gave one to my daughter and she loves it too. Just wow!!Update after a few days' use:. Notice the middle section the yellow part is a bit firmer than the rest mainly to brush the top of your teeth which is quite useful but be mindful of it because if you brush too zealously, which I did, made my gum hurt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfy for my gums
reviews.reviewText: Soft, cleans well, leaves a great feeling. The brush head is a tad bulky for me, but not so much that I would quit using this brush. My gums are happy and my teeth are squeaky clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Your tooth will be shiny after first time of use!This is my favorite toothbrush forever! Suitable for all ages, adults and kids!Thank you so much dear LINDO! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I found this item at Marshalls originally. It was the greatest experience I ever had using a toothbrush. When I first used it, all I could think is this was luxurious. I know it sounds weird to use the word luxurious with a toothbrush, however I must say it was so soft on my gums and with 12,000 ultra fine bristles it really does a great job cleaning. My teeth feel like I was at the dentist after brushing, so clean and shiny. I will never go back to a regular toothbrush again. I bought 8 more toothbrushes from Amazon because I loved it so much. I plan to give out as a little extra to my friends and family. You will not be disappointed.
It is really good....soft and clean really good...recommended.

I love these Lindo toothbrushes. I have very sensitive teeth and gums so finding a good toothbrush that does the job without being too rough is a challenge. These toothbrushes are extremely soft but clean and polish my teeth to the max...the perfect combination. They will be my toothbrush of choice from here on in. I highly recommend
